about_the_game:
A Top-down Horror game, where light is your only weapon against the monsters lurking in the shadows. Keep your torch alive as you attempt to uncover the secrets hidden within the forest.

A night staying in a cottage, in the middle of the woods gets scary, as ominous sounds and shadowy figures appear to be coming from the woods.
Face your fears, and find the truth to discover why figures seem to lurk in the trees, watching you from the darkness.

Explore ominous locations

Forests, caves, swamps and more. Each with their own unique challenges to work out. Find your way through safely while avoiding a range of mysterious foes.

Fend off monsters

A variety of creatures lurk in the shadows, each with unique behaviors to work out. Keep your distance and use your torch wisely to prevent them from catching you.

Search for clues, to understand the nightmares

Use your torch to help uncover hidden clues and guide you to safety. Many things aren't as they seem, and your torch can help guide you to uncover the truth.

Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel i5-3570 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050Ti or AMD Radeon RX 570 Video Memory 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 5600XT
